protocol.text: Seedlings were grown until day 9, then dark-treated for 24 h and kept in dark during treatment. For treatments, 80 μl of the stock were added to the seedling cultures for a final concentration of 10 μM, and an equal volume of EtOH was used as control. Seedlings were harvested, washed and directly frozen in liquid nitrogen.

Around 100 seeds of Arabidopsis thaliana (L.) Heynh. Col-0 were inoculated into 80 ml of MS medium including 1% sucrose in 250 ml flask. Seedlings were grown at a 16/8 h day/night regime and 180 μmol m-2 s-1 light intensity on a shaker at 80 rpm.
Total RNA isolation was done with the RNeasy Plant mini kit (Qiagen).
RNA was labelled with the MessageAMP II-Biotin Enhanced (Ambion) kit according to the manufactures protocol

After verifying RNA integrity using the Agilent RNA 6000 Nano Kit and the Agilent 2100 Bioanalyzer, the labeled aRNA was hybridized to Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array (GeneChip System(r), Affymetrix) chips at ATLAS Biolabs (Berlin, Germany).
protocol.type: nucleic acid hybridization to array protocol

protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned by ATLAS Biolabs (Berlin, Germany).
protocol.type: array scanning and feature extraction protocol

protocol.text: CEL files from the Affymetrix Chips were processed by use of the Robin program (Lohse et al., 2010). The Robust Multi-chip Average (RMA) normalization was performed using the default settings of the corresponding Robin function.
protocol.type: array scanning and feature extraction protocol
